tool_description:
## Omniinfer API: Fast Image Generation for 10,000+ Models  - Get Started For Free!

💡 **Features:** Text-to-Image / Image-to-Image / ControlNet / LoRA / Inpainting, supporting over 10,000+ models (including Stable Diffusion 1.x/2.x, SDXL 1.0, following civitai models, sfw / nsfw, 18+ / no 18+, hentai / no hentai, dreamlike, 3D, realistic, anime, realism, comic, fantasy, quality porn, art ).

🚀 To obtain a higher call limit and unlock additional features, please visit the site: [https://omnii...
title: Omniinfer

api_list.name: Text to Image
api_list.description:
For asynchronous image generation, only a task_id will be returned. You should use the task_id to make a call to the /v2/progress API endpoint in order to retrieve the image generation results.

The output is provided in the format of "image/png".

The request cost is influenced by the following parameters: width, height.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com/v2/txt2img"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Generate an image of a serene mountain landscape.
Create a fantasy-style image of a dragon flying over a castle.
Produce an anime-style image of a futuristic city.
Generate a realistic portrait of a woman in a red dress.
Create a 3D render of a spaceship in outer space.
Produce a comic-style image of a superhero in action.
Generate an image of a dreamlike forest with glowing trees.
Create an image of a high-quality art piece featuring abstract shapes.
Produce an image of a realistic animal in its natural habitat.
Generate an image of a fantasy creature in a mystical environment.

api_list.name: Progress
api_list.description:
This page will help you get started with text to image. Support ControlNet. 
Note if you get "status":0 in the response, please try this endpoint later untill the status become to 2

utterances.utterance: Can you check the progress of the image generation task with ID 12345?
What is the status of the task with ID 67890?
Please provide an update on the image generation task with ID abcde.
Has the task with ID fghij completed yet?
I need to know the progress of the task with ID klmno.
Is the task with ID pqrst still in progress?
Can you tell me the current status of the task with ID uvwxy?
What is the latest update on the task with ID z1234?
Has the image generation task with ID 56789 finished?
Please check the status of the task with ID 98765.

api_list.name: Image to  Image

url = "https://omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com/v2/img2img"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Models
api_list.description: This page will help you get started with text to image. Support ControlNet.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the available models for text-to-image generation?
What models are supported for ControlNet?
List the models that can be used for image-to-image generation.
Show me the models available for inpainting tasks.
What are the models that support LoRA?

api_list.name: Text to Image
api_list.description:
For asynchronous image generation, only a task_id will be returned. You should use the task_id to make a call to the /v2/progress API endpoint in order to retrieve the image generation results.

The output is provided in the format of "image/png".

The request cost is influenced by the following parameters: width, height.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com/v2/txt2img"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
